data.description: So, you are in the future and participate in the battle of cyborgs, and your task is to destroy the enemy. Target and shot directly to the enemy. Defend yourself by dodge the opponent's shot and go back into battle! We have many new features for your enjoyment this time around, two new multiplayer scenarios and another refresh of the user interface. New maps for single and multiplayer modes. Multiplayer for up to 6 players! You should concentrate yours on fighting.

changelog.change_log:
For Vega shield replaced teleport.
For Space Girl added the ability to heal at a great distance.
For Magnus added the ability to shoot a weapon in the shield.
Added a new character Ori.
Fixed visual effects for grenade.
Fixed problems with the network code.

New map added.
Updated single player interface.
Added squats for users with Rift.
Fixed purchases.
Fixed problems with the network code.

Added a new character
Added upgrade for weapons
Added viewing statistics and achievements of players

Fixed multiplayer (incorrect connection of more than two players) 
Fixed sorting of layers in the single player menu
Fixed continuation of the game after passing the tutorial (game with weak bots)
Fixed invoking the event of the termination of the game upon client disconnection
Network code optimized
Fixed translation in the multiplayer menu when you change the language

Added character animations, ragdoll falling on kill, extended tutorial, minor bug fixes. 
Improved intelligence bots.

Added new alternative weapons (shield, sniper rifle, healer, grenades). You can also fight on the new map!
Improved interface, network code.
Fixed server connection issues.
Fixed skins to the mobile version.

Fixed "Pirate station" map.
Added animations for platforms.
Minor bugfixes and UI improvements.

Your team was entrusted with an important mission - accompanying a high-value cargo. But during a trip, your team faced a violent attack! There are lots of enemies, but you must hold position at all costs! Protect the Buran, hold position and hold out until backup arrive! 

Add tutorial
Fix network
Fix team management

Your team was entrusted with an important mission - accompanying a high-value cargo. But during a trip, your team faced a violent attack! There are lots of enemies, but you must hold position at all costs! Protect the Buran, hold position and hold out until backup arrive!

Add tutorial
Fix network

Join our challenge "seizure of a pirate station"!
Make the best team and defeat evil pirates! 
All-out for victory!
Fixed issue with running on devices with unsupported language
New location, improved network mode, the server browser, a new weapon.
